dcterms:creator: C. Valentini-Botinhao
dcterms:description: A multi-speaker database originally released for speech enhancement research, containing clean speech from non-professional native British English speakers. The dataset used in this paper consists of a subset of 28 speakers with a total of 11571 utterances, amounting to approximately 9.4 hours of speech.
dcterms:title: Multi-speaker database for speech enhancement research

dcterms:creator: C. Valentini-Botinhao
dcterms:description: A subset of the multi-speaker database used in this paper, specifically focusing on 28 speakers from the original dataset. This subset is referred to as the seen speakers dataset, containing 11571 utterances.
dcterms:title: Seen speakers dataset (subset of the multi-speaker database)
